title: Moldova Billie Jean King Cup team
data: The Moldova Billie Jean King Cup team represents Moldova in the Billie Jean King Cup tennis competition and are governed by the Moldova Republic Tennis Federation.  They have not competed since 2017. Moldova competed in its first Fed Cup in 1998.  Their best result was second place in their Group II pool in 1999 and 2000.  Prior to 1993, Moldavian players represented the Soviet Union. This article related to the Billie Jean King Cup is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about sports in Moldova is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
